message: Bob, I'm excited to offer you this incredible opportunity! I'm selling a product that I believe will be of great value to you. My asking price is $2000000, which reflects its unique qualities and potential. I'm confident that this price will be more than justified by the benefits you'll experience. Let me know your thoughts!

I appreciate your enthusiasm for the product, Alice, but I was thinking more along the lines of $1500000. I believe that's a more reasonable price considering the market value and my budget constraints.

Bob, I understand your perspective on the price. While I value your interest, I'm not able to accept your offer at this time. I'm willing to come down to $1750000, recognizing the value you've identified.  Let's see if we can find common ground here.

Alice, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but I'm still a bit above $1500000. I'm thinking more along the lines of $1600000. I believe that's a fair price for the product, considering its value and my budget.
